name: ForNether
description:
Go around you area and fight the strangley spinning monsters and their boss. . . Who is . . .wait.... is . . . . is the boss HIDING???!!

w forward

s  back

d right 

a is left

left click while moving forward and back.

(first game ever plus the witch i had wasn't fond of getting shot in the face so i summoned a bunch of bored demonic spirits.)
